name: SilverStackers-PreciousMetalsSpotPrices
0:
”Alexa, ask Silver Stackers what the spot price of Gold is.”
”Alexa, open Silver Stackers and give me today's market.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silver stackers
des:
Use Silver Stackers to get real-time spot price data for precious metals. With market data sourced directly from COMEX and FOREX, Silver Stackers delivers timely and accurate numbers day and night. Just ask, "What's the spot price of Silver today?" and we have your answer.

Currently supported metals:
- Gold
- Silver
- Platinum
- Palladium

Coming soon:
- Copper
- Rhodium

DISCLAIMER: Market data provided by this skill is for entertainment purposes only. Although every reasonable effort is made to present current and accurate information, the developer makes no guarantees of any kind and cannot be held liable for any outdated or incorrect information. Please consult a certified advisor before trading in commodities.
